mapper.sql: s.fUuid AS `id`, s.fResourceName AS `resourceName`, s.fUrl AS `url`, s.fOpenMode AS `openMode`, s.fDescription AS `description`, s.fIconCls AS `icon`, s.fParentID AS `parentID`, s.fSequence AS `sequence`, s.fStatus AS `status`, s.fOpened AS `opened`, s.fResourceType AS `resourceType`, s.fUpdateTime AS `updateIime`, s.fCreateTime AS `createTime`
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_resource s WHERE s.fUuid IN (SELECT rr.fResourceID FROM t_userinfo u, t_user_role ur, t_role_resource rr WHERE u.fLoginName = #{loginName} AND u.fUuid = ur.fUserID AND ur.fRoleID = rr.fRoleID) AND s.fResourceType = 0 AND (s.fVersion like CONCAT('%',#{version},'%') OR s.fVersion = '') ORDER BY s.fSequence

SELECT B.fUuid, A.LEVEL FROM ( SELECT @ids AS _ids, ( SELECT @ids := GROUP_CONCAT(fUuid) FROM t_resource WHERE FIND_IN_SET(fParentID, @ids) ) AS cids, @l := @l + 1 AS LEVEL FROM t_resource, (SELECT @ids := #{pid}, @l := 0) b WHERE @ids IS NOT NULL ) A, t_resource B WHERE A.LEVEL != 1 AND FIND_IN_SET(B.fUuid, A._ids)
